original_title: Sri Lanka’s shares edge up in mid day trade
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s shares edged up in mid day trade, Colombo Stock Exchange data showed.
The main All Share Price Index (ASPI) was up 0.29% or 29.67 points t0 10,224.14, the most liquid index S&P SL20 was down 0.20 percent or 5.95 points to 2,996.58.
Top gainers during trade were LOLC, Melstacorp and Royal Ceramics Lanka. (Colombo/July07/2023)
